name: Richard Evans
description: Hi how are you? My name is Evanz. I’m pretty new at this so I’m not exactly sure what goes. I came across your profile and I must confess it had me intrigued. You sound like a woman who knows what she wants and likes to avoid drama and that is exactly who I want. I must tell you I’m here looking for something serious, which might possibly even lead to marriage sometime in the future, if we click. I’d love to know more about you and see how we get along. Drop me a line if you find this interesting enough. Hope to hear from you soon
